name: Hemis Festival & Kalachakra – Ladakh Trip (6th – 13th July 2014)
description:
Overview
Join Roads less travelled on a Ladakh Trip, this trip takes you to the serene and the most beautiful land of Ladakh and land at the famous “Hemis Festival” and The Kalachakra Ceremony. Cross the highest motorable roads on earth, camp right beside the Pangong Lake as you soak every bit of the serene beauty in your heart. Life indeed is a festival to celebrate… !!!
Places Covered: Leh, Pangong Tso, Nubra Valley, Hemis Festival, Kalachakra
